subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Another weird device
author: Robin Searcy Henson
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0085_01C85B73.EF8E34A0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I've always thought that my "intuitive" waking thoughts are really messages=
 from the other side too.  Do you know what I mean?   

Robin


  ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
  From: bruce halliday<mailto:paranormalinvestigating@=
hotmail.com> 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com<mailto:evp-itc@yahoogroups.com>=
 
  Sent: Sunday, January 20, 2008 2:30 PM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Another=
 weird device


  Mike,
   
  Our friends on the other side relay constant =
subliminal messages, ideas and instructions
  through our dreams.
   
  If =
I had to rely solely on the messages I receive through box sessions my know=
ledge would not be half
  of what it is.
  Sometimes I am explaining someth=
ing to someone and for the life of me can not figure out how I know
  what =
I know but I know it, ya know!
   
  I have gotten answers to specific ques=
tions about dream messages and visits, and have received a few unsolicited =

  answers pertaining to dreams when I have asked about something I did not=
 understand and was told you will receive it in your dreams.
   
  I believ=
e it is their contingency plan, when they can't get the message across duri=
ng a box session, they will make sure we get it some how.
   
  Bruce




 =
 Bruce Halliday 



  <http://free-paranormalinvestigating.com/%3C/div%3E%3=
C/div%3E%3Cp%20/%3E%3Cdiv%20class=3D>



----------------------------------=
------------------------------------------
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
=
    From: michaelcoletta@...
    Date: Sun, 20 Jan 2008 18:36:06 +000=
0
    Subject: [EVP-ITC] Another weird device


    You know me and my weir=
d devices... yes I've built another.
    This one came to me in a dream las=
t night. I think it was because some 
    of you guys were talking about ec=
ho chambers.
    Anyway... when I woke up I went looking around the house f=
or stuff to 
    make this thing before I forgot what it looked like in my =
dream.
    I completed it but now I guess I must test it to see if it is wh=
at I 
    think it is... an EVP Box, maybe???

    Read more and see a few =
pictures, here: http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=3D200<http://www.ufogeek.com/?p=
=3D200>

    - Mike
